message: I'm excited to offer you a great deal on this fantastic product! It's a unique opportunity to own a high-value item that I'm confident you'll love. I'm willing to start with a price of $1000000.
I'm very interested in the product, but $1000000 is a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $850000 for it. I think it's a fair price considering the product's value to me.

I understand that $850000 is a bit lower than my initial offer, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer you a price of $950000, which is a compromise between our initial offers. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to you.
